message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Context check: 8+1 essays + own report/memo">
**Context check.** Please confirm you still have the following loaded in your context:

1. All 8+1 source essays
2. Your own Analysis Report (experts) / Memo (translator/editor)

Respond with: **ALL LOADED** or list what's missing.
</teammate-message>

content.text:
Let me check what I actually have in context. I've read the Translator's Preface (multiple times), the Essay 4 Dao-De-Ren-Yi-Li draft, the Appendix essay (Essay 8), and the Profile. I have NOT read all 8 source essays directly — the Profile says "Do NOT re-read the source essays (your memo covers them)." I also haven't read my own Memo recently, though I've seen the summary of it in the Profile.

Let me check what's in my Editor directory.

content.content:
Afterword-Blueprint.md
Memo.md
Profile.md
Q1 - Phenomenal X density in Chinese.md
Review-Essay4-DaoDeRenYiLi.md

- Translator's Preface (DRAFT-R3) — read multiple times
- Essay 4 Dao-De-Ren-Yi-Li draft translation
- Essay 8 (Appendix) source text
- Profile.md (which includes the Step 1 memo summary)
- Afterword-Blueprint.md (just written)
- The 4 detailed expert plans I received in full (Buddhism, Existentialism, Epistemology, Kantian) + 4 more (Metaphysics, Wittgenstein, Phil-mind, Chinese-phil, Phenomenology, Translator-2)

**NOT loaded (would need to re-read):**
- My own Memo.md (Editor directory)
- Source essays 1-7 (I have not read these directly in this session — my context relies on the memo summaries in the Profile)
- The 9 expert Analysis Reports
- The Translation Dictionary

What do you need me to load?
